resources.string:
How to play: 
 
 1. Press PLAY to begin. 
 2. Packages are coming down from the top of the screen. 
 3. You have to swipe your device to the left or right to send these packages into the right direction. 
 	 3.1. If the package is signed with an arrow showing to the left, swipe your device into the left direction. 
 	 3.2. If the package is signed with an arrow showing to the right, swipe your device into the right direction. 
 	 3.3. If the package is damaged, don't swipe your device and let the package pass. 
 4. You can make three mistakes before game ends.
